entry.header: The last business card you'll ever need!
entry.subheader: First impression is the key to success!
entry.text: Get a modern and interactive business card with VortexCards. Showcase your brand in a stunning way and stand out from the competition!

infoVideo.text: VortexCards is a powerful marketing and discovery tool that helps you make a memorable impression at the first point of contact and present yourself as the only logical choice.
infoVideo.textCon: It is designed to help you connect with high-level prospects, deliver your marketing message, and participate in conversations that lead to happy clients.

clients.title: Designed to help you earn more
clients.subheader: When potential clients visit your mini-site, receive more inquiries and close more deals.

cta.text: We handle content creation and business card development.

fullInfo.title: VortexCards offers you these services
fullInfo.subheader: BRAND, POSITION, AND DIFFERENTIATE YOURSELF AT THE FIRST POINT OF CONTACT.

profit.title: Designed to help you earn more
profit.subheader: When potential clients visit your mini-site, receive more inquiries and close more deals.

first.title: Get more referrals and attract clients
first.text: Allow potential and existing clients to email, call, and text you with one click.

second.title: Easier customer connection
second.text: These fast NFC-enabled cards simplify information and contact sharing, improving your workflow.

third.title: Show your work effortlessly
third.text: Tired of opening Telegram every time to present your service? These cards store the info you want to share.

first.testimonial: A very useful and necessary product, especially in my work where I have frequent meetings and negotiations with partners. I think this is a very relevant solution that aligns with modern trends and technologies.
